title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.477 - Internal corrosion control: monitoring
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.477 - Internal corrosion control: monitoring

State Regulations

If corrosive gas is being transported, coupons or other
suitable means must be used to determine the effectiveness of the steps taken
to minimize internal corrosion. Each coupon or other means of monitoring
internal corrosion must be checked two times each calendar year, but at
intervals not exceeding 71/2 months. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.477

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
